root.name: Commander Keen 5: The Armageddon Machine
root.description: SeriesThe Armageddon Machine is episode 2 of the Goodbye Galaxy! series.OverviewThis episode in the Commander Keen series makes an extra reference to Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy: there is a level named Brownian Motion Inducer, which is a component of the spaceship Heart of Gold in the Guide.One of the standout enemies of Commander Keen 5 is a giant robot called Robo Red. It would fire a barrage of laser blasts when facing you.
